page.title: 11FARM DIARY: MILK QUOTA
page.content:
Note: Because of overproduction of milk, the European Economic Community introduced Milk Quotas. Each dairy farmer had to apply for a quota of milk he might produce in a year. These extracts reflect the concern felt by the farmer at Gaitsgill Farm.
17 October At the auction Dad bought three second calf cows. These will go with the bull in November and will calve in August. If no milk quota is allocated then they will be sold new calved in August. 29 January Dad has been to a tribunal to put our case forward for a milk quota. 18 February We heard this morning that our case for a milk quota has been turned down. We will have to see what happens now.
